module.p: buin belong (to), pertain/be related (to) is an intransitive static verb, with verbal noun buntainn
buin appears to be derived from the durative verb bean touch, interfere/meddle/deal/tamper (with) and the two often get confused in modern Gaelic.

Future tense examples (present meaning) from dictionaries and grammars –
Buinidh iad do Chlann Dhòmhnaill.
They belong to Clan Donald / They are MacDonalds. td. 68
Buinidh iad d’ a chéile.
They are related to each other. td. 140
Cha bhuin e don àite seo idir.
He does not belong to this place at all. td. 102
Cha bhuin e dhuit-se.
It does not belong to you. td. 140
Am buin e dhutsa?
Does it belong to you? td. 68
Is ann do Leòdhas a bhuineas e.
He belongs to Lewis. td. 102
[...] a bhuineas do dh’Ìle [...]
[...] who belongs to Islay [...] td. 102
[...] às bith cò dhà a bhuineas e [...]
[...] whoever it belongs to [...] td. 68
[...] a bhuineas do bhaile-mòr
municipal td. 102
[...] a bhuineas do bhalla
mural td. 102
faclan a bhuineas ri marachd
words which pertain to seamanship td. 102
’S ann do Dhia a bhuineas slàinte.
To God belongs salvation. td. 140
Cò dha a bhuineas seo?
To whom does this belong? td. 140
[...] nach buin ris a’ ghnothach
irrelevant td. 102
An rud nach buin duit, na buin da!
Do not meddle with what does not concern you! td. 140 An rud nach buin dhut, na bean dha!
Tha a’ mhuinntir d’am buin e a’ fuireach ann an [...]
The people to whome he is related live in [...] td. 102

Conditional tense examples (past meaning) from dictionaries and grammars –
Bhuineadh i don teaghlach rìoghail.
She was related to the royal family. td. 102

Other examples –
gun bhuntainn do [...]
unrelated to [...] td. 104
[...] gan toirt gu aire nan ùghdarrasan aig a bheil buntainn ris a’ chùis
[...] bringing them to the attention of the relevant authorities td. 104

buinteanas, buntainneas, buntanas, buintinneas. buntuinneas -is link(s), connection(s) (by family/blood), relevance
Bha buinteanas aige ris/don an Eilean Sgitheanach.
He had Skye connections / family links with Skye. td. 68
Thuirt e gun robh buinteanas aig a’ chùis ris an rannsachadh aige.
He said that the matter had relevance to his enquiry. td. 103
tachartas aig an robh buinteanas ri Albainn
an occurrence which had relevance to Scotland td. 103
